definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: These policies will affect non-whites especially.
sentences.chinese: 這些政策對非白種人的影響特別大。

sentences.english: Aboriginal Australians live on average seventeen fewer years than white Australians.
sentences.chinese: 原住澳大利亞人比白種加拿大人平均少活17年左右。

sentences.english: I would lie and say that I am actually half white.
sentences.chinese: 我撒謊說自己實際上有一半的白種人血統。

sentences.english: White people were pointed at in the street and called "foreign devil".
sentences.chinese: 白種人走在街上都會被指着罵“洋鬼子”。

sentences.english: Victim is Caucasian female, approximately twenty-five years old.
sentences.chinese: 受害人是個白種人女性，大概在二十五歲。

sentences.english: And I am white — born in Germany and raised mostly in New Jersey.
sentences.chinese: 而我則是在德國出生，在新西澤長大的白種人。

sentences.english: Because you're a young, attractive white woman.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你是一個魅力四射的白種妙齡女郎。

sentences.english: Already married, 53 year-old Caucasian man living in Los Angeles area.
sentences.chinese: 已經結婚，53歲白種人人居住在洛杉磯地區。

sentences.english: Gary had blue haole eyes and sandy haole hair.
sentences.chinese: 加里長着藍色的眼睛，沙色的頭髮，是典型的白種人。

sentences.english: Then why does the white man despise the yellow?
sentences.chinese: 那麼爲什麼白種人會輕視黃種人呢？

sentences.english: In South Africa the “whites” destroyed their nuclear weapons before handing over power to the “blacks.”
sentences.chinese: 在南非，白種人在黑種人接管政權前摧毀了核武器。

sentences.english: Past studies have mostly involved Caucasians, Lin said.
sentences.chinese: 林香菱說，過去的研究主要涉及白種人。

sentences.english: Growing among black folks as among white.
sentences.chinese: 在黑種和白種公民之間一樣生長。

sentences.english: The white people here don't mix socially with the natives.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的白種人不與土人交往。

sentences.english: No man, be he Red Man or White Man, can be apart.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能夠彼此分開，無論是紅種人還是白種人。

sentences.english: This held true for Caucasians in the U.K. and black Africans in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 這種喜好適用於英國白種人和南部非洲的黑人。

definition: to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
